appName: CLASHBOWL: World Tour Bowling & Media Player
displayName: CLASHBOWL: World Tour Bowling & Media Player
display_name: CLASHBOWL: World Tour Bowling & Media Player
display_long_description:
# TRAVEL THE WORLD. WATCH VIDEOS. PLAY BOWLING.

Welcome to **CLASHBOWL**, the ultimate VR hangout that combines casual arcade bowling with a massive global tour. Why bowl in a boring alley when you can play on a **space station**, inside a **cave**, or in the heart of  **mountains**?

✈️ **WORLD TOUR: 36 UNIQUE VENUES** Explore the largest variety of environments in VR. Travel instantly to 36 stunning destinations including **Las Vegas, Rome, London, New York, Rio, Space Station** and **Chernobyl**. Whether you want a sunny beach, a snowy mountain, or a sci-fi adventure, your destination awaits.

📺 **BUILT-IN MEDIA PLAYER** Turn your bowling session into a party! Our integrated **Media Player** lets you watch your favorite YouTube videos, listen to music, or catch up on podcasts while you play. It’s the perfect way to multitask and relax in VR.

🎳 **CASUAL ARCADE FUN** We prioritize fun over frustration. Enjoy accessible **arcade-style physics** designed for "pick-up-and-play" action. No complex oil patterns or pro-league requirements—just pure enjoyment for you and your friends.

**KEY FEATURES:**

- **Global Multiplayer:** Challenge friends or meet players worldwide.
- **36 Maps:** The most diverse venue list on the store.
- **Arcade Gameplay:** Easy for anyone to pick up and play.
- **Immersive Audio:** Realistic acoustics for every location.

**Stop simulating. Start traveling.** Join the World Tour today!
